channel.title: ::switch command
channel.description: Can someone send me a copy of their ::switch command so i can get rid of my error's? i screwed mine up and im tired of trying to fix it. as a last resort im looking for a cp command. simple as 123. Cmon >:(

item.title: ::switch command
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

There we go!
Thank’s devil, i appreciate it.

item.title: ::switch command
item.dc:creator: @Cute_Devil Cute_Devil
item.description:
@Cute_Devil wrote:

i think this is what you mean maby

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch command
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

well first get the id for Regular magics and ancients then just do like u would any other command

If.Command Startswith IgnoreCase("Switch"); SendFrame("***") else if Frame("****") = ("****") SendFrame("*****");
which i dont know if i got that exactly right but thats the basic just see u enter command :: switch then it turns u spells in frame whatever to ancients or if it is already that it dose the else part and switches back. i hope it helps i kinda suck at this :s

Read full topic
